statements: UPDATE SatelliteWeatherData SET vegetation_health = 0.75 WHERE satellite_image_id = 1 AND weather_id = 2;
UPDATE SatelliteWeatherData SET weather_id = 3, vegetation_health = 0.5 WHERE satellite_image_id = 2;
UPDATE SatelliteWeatherData SET vegetation_health = 0.85 WHERE satellite_image_id = 101 AND weather_id = 201;
UPDATE SatelliteWeatherData SET weather_id = 202, vegetation_health = 0.75 WHERE satellite_image_id = 102;
UPDATE satellite_image_data SET vegetation_health_score = 85.6, image_location = 'New York' WHERE image_id = 'abcd-1234-efgh-5678';
UPDATE weather_data SET temperature = 28.5, precipitation = 0.4 WHERE weather_id = 'xyz-9876-wert-3456';
UPDATE satellite_image_data SET image_location = 'New Location', vegetation_health_score = 0.75 WHERE image_id = 'a14aac6f-0ae1-4b47-b3a6-97434cd72343';

UPDATE satellite_images SET capture_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE weather_data SET temperature = 25.5, humidity = 70.2 WHERE location = 'New York';
UPDATE satellite_images SET capture_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE vegetation_health SET health_index = 0.85 WHERE image_id = 2 AND weather_id = 1;
UPDATE satellite_images SET timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE vegetation_health SET vegetation_type = 'Tropical' WHERE health_id = 3;
